summary: Walmart , A new market just for you!
descriptionHtml:
Walmart
------------------
[UPDATE] Video has been uploaded, Check it out in the Video section!

Walmart , Made by |E.C|Joshua,Leader of EliteCinemaGaming
Video has been uploaded to youtube , find it under ''Videos''

Walmart is a mod that i made, because just as all Bethesta RPG games, Merchants
play a very high role in the gameplay.
I made a walmart-like mod for Fallout 3 too, but since i'm really off of fallout now (i hate FO-NV)
i took up the modding of skyrim again.

Walmart is a market, wich can be found in Riverwood.
Included are :
- Blacksmith.
- Blacksmith that sells Daedric too.
- Alchemist
- Fletcher
- Mage
- Bartender (innkeeper)
- Craftingstations of all kind (Found at therefore shops)
- Interior remake of the RaggedFlagoon
- Small Exterior
- Mapmarker (for FastTraveling. Can be done directly after installing the mod)
- Some Whiterunguards
- Companion Friendly (Followers can enter Walmart)

Keep in mind that i am not the most professional skyrim modder in the world :D
Don't go hating in the comment section!

Known bugs/issue's
-------------------------------------
- Followers might dissapear when you go in/out walmart , fast travel to any location and they will be back.
- Merchants might go idling troughout the whole walmart , it wasn't my meaning but atleast they stay IN walmart , so just an issue not a bug.

If you got any ideas on new projects for me:
- Comment in commentsection
- Add me on steam (jongen603)
- Message on youtube (EliteCinemaGaming)

And if you want to be a good friend for me :
- Like this mod (steam users)
- Endorse this mod (Nexus users)
- Like the video on youtube , and subcribe to us!

www.Youtube.com/EliteCinemaGaming
www.EliteCinema-Gaming.tk
author: Sushikiller
